rooms.name: The Clearing
rooms.description: A mossy clearing surrounded by ancient pines. Sunlight filters through the canopy.

rooms.name: Whispering Pines
rooms.description: Tall pine trees whisper secrets in the wind.

rooms.name: Misty Ravine
rooms.description: A narrow ravine shrouded in perpetual mist.

rooms.name: Crystal Stream
rooms.description: A clear stream sparkles with otherworldly light.

rooms.name: Ancient Grove
rooms.description: Ancient oaks older than memory stand in a circle.

rooms.name: Harris Wildlands Gate
rooms.description: A cedar gate marks the boundary of the homestead. Lanterns glow warm against the dusk.

rooms.name: Harris Lodge
rooms.description: A sturdy lodge of timber and stone. The hearth crackles with steady heat.

rooms.name: Tool & Maker Shop
rooms.description: Tools hang in careful order. The scent of cedar and steel fills the air.

rooms.name: Garden Rows
rooms.description: Neat rows of soil and herbs. Bees drift over lavender and thyme.

rooms.name: Ridge Lookout
rooms.description: A high ridge overlooks the property. The wind carries a promise of rain.
